topic.title: PoC Bundle
topic.shortdesc: The PoC Bundle has been created for the customer who wants to start learning OpenStack and developing applications in a Proof of Concept environment. This bundle provides enough infrastructures to exercise OpenStack administration tasks, network configuration, application development, and to prove how to execute on a deployment plan.

body.p: Given a virtual machine with the characteristics of two (2) cores, 4GB of memory and 40GB of ephemeral hard disk, you can expect to run around 70 virtual machines with a 1.5 oversubscription of CPU cores. At 90 virtual machines, you will have two-to-one CPU core oversubscription and still have ephemeral storage under subscribed and memory just starting to be oversubscribed. This solution only uses LVM storage on the OpenStack Controller node.
